metadata.name: Fight and Win | ft. Busy Signal #1/20
metadata.description:
The Lion’s back at it again with his brand new single FIGHT AND WIN, a powerful anthem for those who never give up when facing adversity, an upful song that represents for those who fight their everyday life’s struggles, with strong faith in God, self-confidence and great perseverance.  
FIGHT AND WIN is produced by the big bad Bizzarri team and published by Senza Dubbi, and it’s probably Lion D’s most outstanding collaboration, as he duets with none other than Jamaican top artist Busy Signal.
